resources.string: This fragment is going to be the calendar made with that calendar library. Each day field is going to display on of those kenney emojies. THe plus button will open the second fragment, which will be the "Add mode" button for the day. Under the calendar, if you click on one of the faces, it will show that days mood and description. Under that there will always be visible that months statistics: These statistics will show how many emotions you had that month, and next to it, a little indicator that shows the difference from the previous month. The database: Mood table, three columns: date, mood, description. The mood will be an enum from which the user can choose: happy, sad, angry, confident, tired, awesome. The description is a string. the date should probably be a long. Each emotion will have a face and color given. This face will appear in the calendar when you log it. If there is already a log for today, clicking the plus button will open those data, and you can edit it.
